duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical expertise in one or more IT risk domain areas to work with other subject/domain owners to provide effective challenge of strategy, decisions, roadmaps, tools/solutions, policies/standards, findings/action plans/risk acceptances, etc.
Represent 2nd line in relevant forums/working groups, and assist with production of the aggregate sub-assessment for those areas in support of quarterly assessments.
Create and maintain 2nd line procedures and processes; will have ownership of executing one or more regular processes within 2nd line.
Engage deeply with subject/domain owners to provide effective challenge of strategy, decisions, roadmaps, tools/solutions, policies/standards, findings/action plans/risk acceptances, etc.
Provide inspection of products/services, projects, software efforts in the Segments, and is authorized to provide 2nd Line approval as appropriate.
Provide counsel as needed to partners in front/1st/2nd/3rd line functions.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma3+ years of related experienceIndustry certification such as CRISC, CISSP, CISA, or similar is required; if the colleague does not possess a certification, they will be expected to attain certification within 12 months of assuming this role.
